title.rendered: CNH Industrial India Private Limited collaborates with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
CNH Industrial and Smile Foundation: Driving positive change with mobile healthcare

Since joining forces in 2015-16, CNH Industrial has been a dedicated supporter of Smile Foundation’s “Smile on Wheels” project in Noida. This partnership aims to make a meaningful difference in the lives of underserved people by providing primary healthcare services.

The “Smile on Wheels” initiative has been instrumental in delivering medical care to those in need. Each year, approximately 15,000 people in Noida receive support through this project, which includes routine health check-ups and specialised care. CNH Industrial’s ongoing commitment continues to play a significant role in enhancing the well-being of the community and ensuring that children receive the medical attention they deserve.

CNH Industrial India Private Limited collaborates with Smile Foundation

Through its association with Smile Foundation, CNH Industrial is bringing about a change in the lives of the less privileged children. CNH Industrial came on board in 2016 to support Smile Foundation’s Mission Education Centre in Noida, Uttar Pradesh and continues to support more than 250 children of daily wagers from the industrial area of Noida who are being nurtured with education and lots of love and care.
Besides education, the centre focuses on holistic development of every child through extracurricular activities, conducting regular health check ups, exposure visits and more.

CNH Industrial joins Smile Foundation in it’s initiative to spread the joy of education and good health

Through its association with Smile Foundation, CNH wants to bring a change in the lives of the less privileged children. As Mr. Gabriele Lucano, Chief Operating Officer states, “CNH understands its social responsibility as an organization and is happy to be associated with Smile Foundation for their noble initiatives towards children’s education and healthcare. Through this partnership we believe to bring growth and development for the less privileged.”

CNH came on board in financial year 2015-16 to support Smile Foundation’s Mission Education and Smile on Wheels programme in Noida and continues to support both the programme in 2018-19. Mission Education project is benefitting 200 underprivileged children and approximately 30,000 beneficiaries have been benefitted through SOW Project in Noida.

CNH began its operations in 1998 with the launch of its first 70 HP tractor. Since then, it has tasted unequalled success with more than 3, 00,000 tractors in numerous applications. New Holland Agriculture currently offers technologically superior range of 35 HP to 90 HP tractors in India. It is the first company in India to offer most appropriate & advanced mechanization solutions to Indian farmers for enhancing crop productivity.

Not just India, tractors made by CNH have made their mark across the world. Today, tractors manufactured at its Greater Noida plant are exported to more than 70 countries in South East Asia, Africa, Middle East, Australia, North America etc.
